cause.description:
Sure, everyone is entitled to an opinion, and it is one thing to disagree - but it is quite another to PERSECUTE, HATE, and JUDGE another's opinion just to prove yours is correct. As American citizens, we have the RIGHT and the DUTY to state our opinions in a manner that justifies what we have to say. As long as the demonstration is peaceful, there is no reason to create such chaos.
1. Expression
2. Ability to say what you mean without persecution
3. Upholding of 1st Amendment rights
cause.mission: allow freedom of speech to flourish, just as our first amendment right states.
cause.name: Freedom of the Pen
